entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is initially unsure if his dream was real or not.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A giant who appears in Harry's dream and tells him he is going to a school for wizards. He is also physically present in the hut when Harry wakes up.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Harry's aunt, who knocks on the door in his dream.

entities.name: diagon alley
entities.description: A location that is mentioned as a place where wizards go to buy school supplies.

relationships.description: Hagrid visits Harry in his dream.
Harry has a connection to Diagon Alley, although it is not specified what this relationship is.
